column5: Hey Guys,   I was up at fishing world in hamilton picking up some shinners and when i was there everyone was talking about how amazing these slab grabber lures are. I picked a couple up but i havent used them yet (this weekend at nip will be the first), just wondering if anyone has used them and what they got.    Tight Lines,
Woorked well on perch. Thebead colour does matter.

I fish perch on lake couchiching often and have been using them alot this year. They have been outfishign minnows at times the have a good flutter to them . Tremblays tackle box ( local tackle shop) is having a hard time keeping them in stock. Havent used them for much else but will be on nipissing tomorrow and will give it a shot. Good luck
Red Bead seams to work best. Split ring on with no heavier than 4LB.line.
